column4: I need to update my bios, but the executable MSI provides needs windows in order to create the bios update disk
I can't remember the name but someone told me there is a win boot rescue cd.  If you can boot to that maybe put the msi on a usb key and run it.
has it ever booted to the install sata drives?

that's really weird.. if it has sata capability on the board there might be something you missed in the bios for turning them on.  or boot order something.. No point in having sata connections if you cant use them..
